services.description: For freelancers, consultants, and independent professionals, Opus Virtual Offices helps you make a great first impression, without the overhead. Use a real business address to protect your privacy, as well as a phone number to separate work from personal calls. Together with our live receptionist services, we make every client interaction feel polished, reliable, and professional.

features.title: Prestigious Business Address
features.description: Select one of our Virtual Offices locations as your primary business address and use it to receive all your mail and packages.

features.title: Live Call Answering
features.description: Monday through Friday from 8:30am to 5:30pm (in PST timezone 8am to 5pm) a live receptionist will be answering all incoming calls on behalf of your company.

features.title: Premium Call Transferring
features.description: All calls that are being transferred to your personal extension by our Live Receptionist will ring up to 4 phone numbers provided by you. If the call is not answered, your personal extension voice mail box will activate

features.title: Company Phone and Fax Number
features.description: Select one of our local phone and fax numbers as your primary company line.

features.title: Voicemail & Fax converted to Email
features.description: All voice mail messages and faxes are being forwarded to Tenant's provided e-mail address as a WAV / PDF File.

industry_content.industry_paragraph: As a freelancer, your talent is your business. However, your image is what helps you stand out. Whether you’re a consultant, graphic designer, writer, web developer, or creative professional, an Opus Virtual Office gives you the tools and credibility you need to compete with larger firms, without the high overhead costs.

Instead of using a home address for your business, you’ll have a prestigious corporate address in a major city hub of your choice. This enhances your brand image, builds client trust, and helps you maintain privacy while showcasing a legitimate business presence.

With a dedicated business phone number, live receptionists, and professional call answering, you’ll never miss an opportunity. Every call is answered in your company’s name, helping you appear larger and more established while you focus on your projects.

Opus makes it easy to manage your business remotely. Our office receives your mail and offers forwarding options. Opus also provides you with a business phone number, and our professional team receives all your calls and transfers them accordingly. This delivers the administrative support you need to stay organized and productive, all from wherever you work best.

Avoid the monthly expense of leasing an office or hiring staff. For one low monthly fee, you get a complete all-inclusive virtual office solution, from a business address and mail handling to call management, allowing you to invest your resources into what truly matters: growing your freelance business.

industry_content.industry_paragraph: With Opus, you can work from home, at a coffee shop, or on the go and still present your clients with a polished, professional front.
